Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'GlobalSiteStatus' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].GlobalSiteStatus GO CREATE VIEW GlobalSiteStatus AS SELECT [Company].[CompanyCD] AS 'TenantName', [INSite].[SiteCD] AS 'WarehouseID', [INSite].[Descr] AS 'WarehouseDescription', [InventoryItem].[InventoryCD] AS 'InventoryID', [InventoryItem].[Descr] AS 'InventoryDescription', [INSiteStatus].[Qty], [INSiteStatus].[QtyOnHand] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyNotAvail] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyAvail] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyHardAvail] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyActual] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyInTransit] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyInTransitToSO] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyINReplaned] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyPOPrepared] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyPOOrders] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyPOReceipts] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyFSSrvOrdBooked] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyFSSrvOrdAllocated] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyFSSrvOrdPrepared] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtySOBackOrdered] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtySOPrepared] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtySOBooked] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtySOShipped] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtySOShipping] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyFixedFSSrvOrd] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyPOFixedFSSrvOrd] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyPOFixedFSSrvOrdPrepared] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyPOFixedFSSrvOrdReceipts] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtySOFixed] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyPOFixedOrders] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyPOFixedPrepared] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyPOFixedReceipts] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtySODropShip] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyPODropShipOrders] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyPODropShipPrepared] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyPODropShipReceipts] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyINIssues] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyINReceipts] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyINAssemblySupply] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyINAssemblyDemand] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyInTransitToProduction] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyProductionSupplyPrepared] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyProductionSupply] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyPOFixedProductionPrepared] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyPOFixedProductionOrders] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyProductionDemandPrepared] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyProductionDemand] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyProductionAllocated] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtySOFixedProduction] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyProdFixedPurchase] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyProdFixedProduction] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyProdFixedProdOrdersPrepared] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyProdFixedProdOrders] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyProdFixedSalesOrdersPrepared] ,[INSiteStatus].[QtyProdFixedSalesOrders] FROM INSiteStatus LEFT JOIN Company ON Company.CompanyID = INSiteStatus.CompanyID LEFT JOIN InventoryItem ON InventoryItem.InventoryID = INSiteStatus.InventoryID and InventoryItem.CompanyID = INSiteStatus.CompanyID LEFT JOIN INSite ON INSite.SiteID = INSiteStatus.SiteID and INSite.CompanyID = INSiteStatus.CompanyID WHERE INSiteStatus.CompanyID > 0
